com.metsci.glimpse.gl.texture

Interface DrawableTexture

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Texture
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteTextureProjected2D, ColorTextureProjected2D, ExternalTextureProjected2D, Float16TextureProjected2D, FloatTexture2D, FloatTextureProjected2D, RGBATextureProjected2D, RGBTextureProjected2D, ShortTextureProjected2D, TextureProjected2D

    public interface DrawableTexture
extends Texture
    A marker interface indicating that the Texture is able to draw itself given a GL handle.
    Author:
    ulman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(GlimpseContext context, DrawableTextureProgram program, int texUnit, Collection<TextureUnit<Texture>> multiTextureList)
      Draw the texture using the provided program.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.metsci.glimpse.gl.texture.Texture

        dispose, getDimensionSize, getHandles, getNumDimension, isDirty, makeDirty, prepare

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(GlimpseContext context,
          DrawableTextureProgram program,
          int texUnit,
          Collection<TextureUnit<Texture>> multiTextureList)
        Draw the texture using the provided program.
        Parameters:
        context - GlimpseContext for drawing
        program -
        texUnit - Texture unit to use while drawing
        multiTextureList - Other textures to activate (and their texture units) for multitexturing purposes
